locations.title: Oridys's Rise Puzzle
locations.description:
Interact with the pedestal in front of [Oridys's Rise](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163958) to begin the puzzle to unlock the barrier.

**Clue:** Seek 3 wise beasts

**Solution:** You need to find and kill the three ghostly tortoises:

1. Found on the path leading up to the tower. To the north of the pedestal.
2. Found in the bushes behind the pedestal (to the left of the staircase)
3. Found in a small pond behind the tower.  This tortoise won't be visible, instead you'll need to watch for splashes in the water to find it's location.

locations.title: Testu's Rise Puzzle
locations.description:
Interact with the pedestal in front of Testu's Rise to begin the puzzle to unlock the barrier.

**Clue:** Seek 3 wise beasts

**Solution:** You need to find and kill the three ghostly tortoises:

1. Found to the left of the stairs
2. Found behind the tower, on a tree
3. Found to the right of the tower, below

locations.title: Converted Fringe Tower Puzzle
locations.description: To clear the puzzle, perform the [Erudition](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169037) gesture while wearing any Glintstone Crown in front of the door.

locations.title: Sellia Magic Barriers Puzzle
locations.description:
[Sellia, Town of Sorcery](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164388) has many magic barriers blocking entry to important buildings.  

**Solution:** To remove the barriers you must light 3 Braziers at the top of the bell towers in the town:

1. [Brazier #1](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169046)
2. [Brazier #2](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169045)
3. [Brazier #3](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169044)

Use the branches and the platform with the [Golden Seed](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165726) towards the north of the town to jump onto the roofs of the buildings to access the towers.

Once the barriers are lifted the following chests will be accessible:
- [Night Comet](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167980)
- [Spelldrake Talisman +1](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167984)
- [Imbued Sword Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166788)

As well as unlocking access to the [Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166499) bosses

locations.title: Chelona's Rise Puzzle
locations.description:
You need to kill three Ghostly Turtles to unlock the barrier.
- The [first turtle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170236) can be found directly west of the tower, hanging off the cliff.
- The [second turtle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170217) is far to the east, south of [Lunar Estate Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167579).
- The [third and final turtle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170235) is southeast of [Ringleader's Evergaol](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165508), above a Spiritspring.

locations.title: Albinauric Rise Puzzle
locations.description: **Solution:** To break the seal  you need to summon [Fanged Imp Ashes](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170298) (sold by the [Isolated Merchant](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165649) inside the [Raya Lucaria Academy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164427)) and then kill the imps that appear.

locations.title: Statue of Radagon
locations.description: Use [Law of Regression](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=182154) in front of the statue to learn the secret of Radagon's identity. Needed to progress [Brother Corhyn's quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178950).

locations.title: Mirage Rise Puzzle
locations.description:
**Location:** Interact with the three sigils to make the tower appears. The sigil's location are revealed through the Mirage Riddle map.  
**Sigil locations:**
- [Mirage Rise - Sigil #1](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168069)
- [Mirage Rise - Sigil #2](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168068)
- [Mirage Rise - Sigil #3](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168070)

locations.title: Converted Tower Puzzle
locations.description: **Solution:** Perform the [Erudition](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169037) gesture in front of the statue; a ladder will appear, granting you access.

locations.title: Roderika's Task
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to the [Red Cloaked Woman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163944) and exhaust all dialogue options.  
**Steps:**
1. Obtain the [Chrysalid's Memento](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164740) in [Stormveil Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164053)
2. Return the [Chrysalid's Memento](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164740) to [Roderika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163944) before killing Godrick the Grafted
3. Go to the [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686) and speak with [Roderika (2nd Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170232)
4. Speak with [Smithing Master Hewg](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167788)
5. Speak with [Roderika (2nd Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170232) again
6. Speak with [Smithing Master Hewg](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167788) again
7. Leave and then return to the [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686) and [Roderika (2nd Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170232) will now offer Spirit Tuning services
8. Return to the location of the [Chrysalid's Memento](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164740) to find the [Crimson Hood](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168288) in its place.

**Loot:**
- [Crimson Hood](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168288)

locations.title: Sorceress Sellen's Quest
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to [Sorceress Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164616) beneath [Waypoint Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164000).  
**Steps:**
1. Interact with [Primeval Sorcerer Azul](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170408) to receive [Comet Azur](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167814).
2. Come back to speak with Sellen.
3. Interact with [Master Lusat](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169049) to recieve [Stars of Ruin](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169050).
4. Come back to speak with Sellen.
5. Advance [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648) until the defeat of [Starscourge Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165444).
6. Come back to speak with Sellen.
7. Speak with [the real Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165418) in the underground cellar of the [Witchbane Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163983) to receive [Sellen's Primal Glintstone](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170410).
8. Exhaust dialogue with [Jerren](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168920) at [Redmane Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164397) if you haven't already done so.
9. Exhaust dialogue with [Jerren](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169155) at [Witchbane Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163983)
10. Place the Primal Glinstone in [Sellen's body](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170411), in [Seluvis's Hidden Cellar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168240).
11. Speak with Jerren, first [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168920), then [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169155).
12. Go to [Raya Lucaria Grand Library](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164426), then choose to either [assist Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170412) or [challenge Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170413); see both options for quest rewards.

locations.title: Irina's Quest
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to [Irina](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164637) until she gives you _Irina's Letter_

**Steps:** 
1. Talk to  [Irina](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164637) and she'll give you Irina's Letter, which she asks you to deliver to her father [Edgar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164794) in [Castle Morne](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163951).
2. [Edgar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164794) tell you that he can't leave until he's made sure that the [legendary sword](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164813) of [Castle Morne](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163951) isn't going to be claimed by the **Misbegotten** first. He'll also give a [Sacrificial Twig](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164795)
3. Head back to [Irina's location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164637). She'll be dead, with an **Iron Cleaver** embedded in the ground next to her.
4. Head back to [Castle Morne](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163951), and this time progress through it and down to the Southernmost point, down to the beach. There'll be a boss fight with an enemy called the [Leonine Misbegotten](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164812).
5. Killing the [Leonine Misbegotten](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164812) gives you the [Grafted Blade Greatsword](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164813). Take it back to [Edgar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164794) - he won't take it off you, just simply need to prove that the **Misbegotten** won't get hold of it. He thanks you and says he's going to go see [Irina](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164637) now his duty's done.
6. Head back to  [Irina](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164637) for a third time and you'll find **Edgar** mourning over her body. Talk to him and exhaust his dialogue.
7. **Edgar** reappears as a hostile NPC invader called [Edgar the Revenger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166811), found at the [Revenger's Shack](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166810).

locations.title: Kenneth Haight's Quest
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to [Kenneth Haight](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164853) exhausting all dialogue options.  
**Steps:**
1. Clear [Fort Haight](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164002) of enemies.
2. Speak with [him](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164853) to receive the [Erdsteel Dagger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166235).
3. Speak with him at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165656).
4. Advance [Nepheli's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169124) until he travels to the Throne Room [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171949)
5. Speak with him in his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171948) in the Throne Room.

locations.title: Boc's Quest
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Free [Boc](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164089) from his curse (hit the small brown tree) and speak to him.  
**Steps:**
1. Speak with him, exhausting all dialogue; you will receive 10x Mushroom.
2. Go and speak with Boc at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165130) by the [Coastal Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164030) site of grace.
2. Obtain the [Sewing Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164459).
3. Give [Boc (Coastal Cave)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165130) the Sewing Needle.
4. Complete the following, in any order:
    - Obtain the [Gold Sewing Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165648)
    - Purchase one piece of alterable legendary armor from [Finger Reader Enia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170553)
    - Exhaust [Melina](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170554)'s dialogue about Boc at [East Raya Lucaria Gate](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164179) Site of Grace.
5. Give Boc* the Golden Sewing Needle.
6. Exhaust his dialogue, then choose how to complete the quest:
    - Use [Prattling Pate "You're Beautiful"](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167215) in front of him.
    - Give him a Larval Tear. Boc relocates [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170555), unable to be interacted with.
    - Do neither. Boc relocates [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170555), unable to be interacted with.

*Boc periodically relocates, according to your progress through the game. He will be at the furthest location you have unlocked among these Sites of Grace:
- [Boc (Lake-Facing Cliffs)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165682)
- [Boc (East Raya Lucaria Gate)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167183)
- [Boc (Altus Highway Junction)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168040)
- [Boc (East Capital Rampart)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168658)

locations.title: Blaidd's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Move through the [Mistwood Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164003) until you hear a wolf's howl.    
**Steps:**
1. Speak with [Merchant Kalé](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164446) about the howl; you will receive the [Finger Snap](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167512) gesture.
2. Travel back [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165206) and use the Finger Snap gesture; Blaidd will appear at the location. Speak with him.
3. Summon [Blaidd, the Half-Wolf](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170964) to fight [Bloodhound Knight Darriwil](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164486) at the [Forlorn Hound Evergaol](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163965). Speak with him after the fight.
4. Speak with [Smithing Master Iji](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165592) to unlock [Carian Filigreed Crest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170422) in his inventory.
5. Complete [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648).
6. Go to [Ranni's Rise](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165878) and fight [Blaidd, the Half-Wolf](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168984) turned hostile.
7. Speak with [Smithing Master Iji](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165592), then reload the area.

**Note:** Steps 1 through 4 are optional to Blaidd's quest completion. However, once you start Ranni's Quest, Blaidd will relocate, locking you out of those steps and associated rewards.

locations.title: Sorcerer Thops' Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Sorcerer Thops](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165263), after unlocking his merchant inventory.  
**Steps:**
1. Obtain the [Academy Glintstone Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165842) found in [Raya Lucaria Academy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164427).
2. Give the key to [Thops](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165263)
3. Go to meet [Thops](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165853) at the [Raya Lucaria Academy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164427)

locations.title: Patches' Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Spare [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164504) during his boss fight and speak to him after.
**Steps:** 
1. Exhaust all dialogue options with Patches
2. Activate [Patches' Trap Chest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165137)
3. Travel back to [Murkwater Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164022) and speak with [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165135)
4. Go to [Scenic Isle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166437) and speak with [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166734) there
5. Go to the [First Mt. Gelmir Campsite](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165883) Site of Grace and make your way up to [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169057)
6. Find the brightly colored stones near the cliff and trigger a cutscene
7. Go to [Volcano Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164405) and complete the first couple assassination quests for them
8. Speak with [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175962) and receive Letter to Patches
9. Go to the [Ruin-Strewn Precipice](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165513) and defeat [Great Horned Tragoth](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168974)
10. Return and speak with [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175962)
11. Reload the area and speak with Patches again who will reward you with the [Magma Whip Candlestick](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169020)
12. After [Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167571) has been killed, speak with Patches at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175930) and receive the [Dancer's Castanets](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175929)
13. Go to [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165135)' starting location where he will attack you
14. Spare him again and he will reward you with [Patches' Crouch](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176584) and continue to offer his merchant services

locations.title: Ranni's Quest
locations.description:
**Warning:** Beginning this quest before [Sorcerer Rogier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168232) instructs you to during [Rogier's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169102), will cause the latter to become unavailable.

**How to Begin:** Speak with [Ranni the Witch](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166221)  
**Steps:**
1. Exhaust all dialogue options with Iji, Blaidd, and Seluvis at the bottom of the tower
2. Speak with [Blaidd](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167764) in the Siofra River
3. Speak with [Preceptor Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877) to obtain Seluvis's Introduction
4. Speak with [Sorceress Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164616)
5. Defeat [Starscourge Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165444)
6. Enter [Nokron, Eternal City](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167493) and retrieve the [Fingerslayer Blade](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170239)
7. Give the Fingerslayer Blade to [Ranni the Witch](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166221) (doing so will prevent completion of [Seluvis' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169060) if incomplete)
8. Ascend the [Divine Tower of Liurna](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164411) and retrieve the [Cursemark of Death](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169305)
9. Go to [Ainsel River Main](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167480) and pick up the Miniature Ranni that sits on the coffin
10. Rest at the Site of Grace and speak with the Miniature Ranni (you may need to activate the dialogue option multiple times before she responds)
11. Defeat the [Baleful Shadow](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168546) to obtain the [Discarded Palace Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176421)
12. Go to [Raya Lucaria Grand Library](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164426) and retrieve the [Dark Moon Ring](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177447)
13. Go back to Ainsel River and traverse the Lake of Rot ([Flame, Cleanse Me](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166672) is very helpful for this)
14. Enter the [Portal to Astel, Naturalborn of the Void](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168579)
15. Defeat [Astel, Naturalborn of the Void](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167488) and retrieve [Remembrance of the Naturalborn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170488)
16. Take the [elevator](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168601) to the north up to the [Moonlight Altar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166807) 
17. Enter the [Cathedral of Manus Sellus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165510)
18. Use the [Dark Moon Ring](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177447) with Miniature Ranni and retrieve the [Dark Moon Greatsword](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167891)

locations.title: Rya's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to [Rya](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166413)  
**Steps:**
1. Go to the [Boilprawn Shack](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166185) and speak with [Blackguard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166187)
2. Purchase [Rya's Necklace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177671) for 1000 Runes (you can kill [Blackguard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166187), but it is not recommended as he has his own [questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177672))
3. Return the [necklace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177671) to [Rya](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166413) to receive the [Volcano Manor Invitation](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166812)
4. Speak with Rya at her new location either [near the Grand Lift of Dectus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169808) or [at the Lux Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176450)
5. Gain access to the [Volcano Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164405) and begin [Tanith's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178114)
6. Speak with Rya in her [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178115)
7. Progress [Tanith's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178114) until after the first assassination
8. Speak with Rya (Zorayas) in her [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169809) 
9. Progress [Tanith's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178114) until after the second assassination
10. Speak with [Rya](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169809) about the secret passage
11. Use the secret passage to go to the [Prison Town Church](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168026) Site of Grace and open the church doors just beyond
12. Report back to [Rya](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169809)
13. Go to the [Temple of Eiglay](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167423) and defeat the [Godskin Noble](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168177)
14. Retrieve the [Serpent's Amnion](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168772) and return it to [Rya](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169809)
15. _Optional_ - Reload the area, then speak with [Tanith](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167573) about Rya and obtain the [Tonic of Forgetfulness](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178118)
16. Go and speak with Rya in her [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178116)
17. Do ONE of the following: 
    - Kill Rya.  This ends her quest and she drops [Daedicar's Woe](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176504)
    - Give Rya the [Tonic of Forgetfulness](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178118).  This makes her go to sleep
    - Spare Rya and do not give her the [Tonic](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178118).  Return to [her location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178116) later after defeating [Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167571) to find [Daedicar's Woe](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176504) and [Zorayas's Letter](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178117)

locations.title: Gowry's Request
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Exhaust all dialogue options with [Gowry](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166841)  
**Steps:**
1. Defeat [Commander O'Neil](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166073)
2. Retrieve the [Unalloyed Gold Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167903) from him and deliver it to [Gowry](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166841)
3. Reload the area, then speak with Gowry to receive the Repaired Needle
4. Go to the [Church of Plague](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165583) and give the Needle to [Millicent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167228)
5. Reload the area and speak with [Millicent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167228) again to receive the [Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166727)
6. Go to [Gowry's Shack](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164387) and speak with [Millicent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167695) there
7. After progressing in [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656), purchase [Pest Threads](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169253) from [Gowry](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166841). This will trigger a new dialogue regarding Rot Incarnations.
8. Once the conversation is complete, you will get the [Desperate Prayer](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171340) gesture as a reward.
9. Speak with him again after assisting Millicent at [Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170281) for more dialogue - if you chose to kill him you will receive [Gowry's Bell Bearing](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=180823), and the [Flock's Canvas Talisman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169254).

locations.title: D's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to [D, Hunter of the Dead](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164536).  
**Steps:**
1. Defeat [Tibia Mariner](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164859) in [Summonwater Village](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164017).
2. Speak with him at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165684).
3. Visit [Gurranq, Beast Clergyman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165617) and give him at least 1 Deathroot.
4. Speak with D at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167782), in the [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686).
5. Advance [Fia's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170981), until you receive the [Weathered Dagger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170980).
6. Give the [Weathered Dagger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170980) back to [D](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167782).
6. Reload the area, then go back to where Fia was to obtain the [Twinned Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170979) and [D's Bell Bearing](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170982).
7. Optional: Speak with [D's twin brother](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168405), and give him the Twinned Set.
8. If you gave the armor to D's brother, after finishing [Fia's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170981), return to Fia in the [Deeproot Depths](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167605) to obtain a rune. Speak with [D's brother](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170983), who will have relocated here.

**Loot:**
- [Twinned Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168994)
- [D's Bell Bearing](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170982)
- [Mending Rune of the Death-Prince](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177162)

locations.title: Diallos' Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to [Diallos](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167783) at [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686)

**Steps:**
1. After talking with Diallos at the Roundtable Hold, you'll find him at his [second location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167227) to the North and slightly West of the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace in Northern Liurnia atop a sunken roof.
Diallos is standing at ground level west of the grace on the northern edge of the town ruins. If you look on the map, he's located at almost exactly the rightmost tip of the Academy Gate Town icon.
2. He will then be at the Roundtable Hold again. Exhaust his dialogue and then he'll be at [Volcano Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164405), in the drawing room, having decided to join the organization. Diallos will have new dialogue when the character progressed through the Volcano Manor. If the Volcano Manor quest line is finished Diallos will disappear.
3. After completing the second letter from Volcano Manor, he will leave the manor and relocate to [Jarburg](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166209).
4. After progressing the Jarburg questline he will appear in one of the shacks, tending to a little jar.
If you are having trouble continuing the Jarburg questline, try talking to [Jar-Bairn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170335) and exhausting all its dialogue options, and then passing time at the nearby grace. You may have to do this multiple times.
5. After seeing him in [Jarburg](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166209), let some time pass. Once enough time has passed, and you can talk to Diallos once more. After exhausting dialogue with him and Jar-Bairn you can rest to advance the quest.
6. After passing enough time, [Jarburg](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166209) is attacked and Diallos is wounded. You can talk to him and he'll ask if he was able to defend the jars, to which you can tell him he succeeded or he failed. He will die shortly after. Upon reloading the area, Jar-Bairn will move over to Diallos, "eating" his remains for his power.
7. After some time, Diallos’s body will disappear, leaving behind Diallos's Mask, Hoslow's Petal Whip, and a Numen's Rune where he was last encountered.

locations.title: Seluvis' Quest
locations.description:
**Requirements:** Begin [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648) and progress until you talk with a ghostly Seluvis.

**Warning:** Giving the potion to anyone besides [Gideon Ofnir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169061) will end the respective person's questline.

**How to Begin:** Speak to [Preceptor Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877) in his [tower](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165495) and exhaust all dialogue options.      
**Steps:**  
- There are 3 major options for administering the potion:
    - Give the potion to Nepheli.  Her [questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169124) will end.  Continue this questline to gain her as a puppet.
    - You can give the potion to [Milos (Dung Eater)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168118) provided his [questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072) has been progressed to where he's locked in a chair.  His questline will end.  Continue this questline to gain him as a puppet.
    - Tell [Gideon Ofnir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169061) about the potion and give it to him to dispose of.  No questlines will end.  Continue this questline to gain a generic puppet.
1. Go to the [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686) and speak with [Gideon Ofnir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169061) about Nepheli
2. If not done already - progress [Nepheli's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169124) until after you defeat the [Omenkiller](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166426)
3. Speak with Nepheli in the [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686)
4. Speak with [Gideon Ofnir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169061) about Nepheli
5. Give the potion to [Gideon Ofnir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169061) OR [Nepheli Loux](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171950) OR [Dung Eater](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168118)
6. Return to [Preceptor Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877) for your reward
7. Find and explore all of [Seluvis's Hidden Cellar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168240)
8. Return again to [Preceptor Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877) who will sell you a puppet.
9. Purchase all puppets and any sorceries [Preceptor Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877) sells.  Then ask him "About the Scheme".
10. Obtain the [Amber Starlight Shard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167876) and return it to [Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877)
11. Exhaust his dialogue options and he will reward you with the [Magic Scorpion Charm](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169028)
12. Rest, reload the area and speak with him again to obtain the [Amber Draught](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177296)
13. Give the Draught to [Ranni the Witch](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166221).  She will be offended and cast you away (this will end her [questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648) until you absolve yourself by offering a Celestial Dew at the [Church of Vows](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165501))
14. Return to [Preceptor Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877) to find [Seluvis’s Bell Bearing](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169026) and [Preceptor's Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168975)

locations.title: Dung Eater's Quest
locations.description:
**Requirements:** Gain access to [Leyndell, Royal Capital](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164582)

**How to Begin:** Speak to [Milos (Dung Eater)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168231) in [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686)  
**Steps:**  
1. Give him a Seedbed Curse and in return he'll give you the [Sewer-Gaol Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169062), which you can use to unlock the [Sewer Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168119)
2. Go and find [him in the sewers beneath Leyndell](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168118).  When he asks you who you are, choose "Leave your gaol!"
3. Return to Roundtable Hold. [Dung Eater](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168231) will have left a message asking you to [fight him outside Leyndell](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169012).
    - Make sure to have completed [Blackguard's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177672), as it will grant you an additional Seedbed Curse.
4. After defeating him, return to Roundtable Hold and speak to him again. He will ask you to bring his [body in the sewers](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168118) 5 Seedbed Curses.
5. After delivering the Seedbed Curses he will reward you with the Mending Rune of the Fell Curse

locations.title: Rogier's Quest
locations.description:
**Warning:** Beginning [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648) before the correct step will cause this quest to end.

**How to Begin:** Speak to [Sorcerer Rogier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164686) in the church in Stormveil Castle.
**Steps:**
1. Defeat [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164052)
2. Go speak with [Rogier at his new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168232) and he'll give you [Rogier's Rapier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=174929)
3. Go to [Stormveil Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164053), in the area where the [Root Monster](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165164) spawns and examine Rogier's bloodstain and the rotting face
4. Return to [Sorcerer Rogier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168232) and exhaust all dialogue options
5. Exhaust all dialogue options with [Fia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167503)
6. Go to the [Black Knife Catacombs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166481) and defeat the [Black Knife Assassin](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166482) to obtain the [Black Knifeprint](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166486)
7. Speak with [Sorcerer Rogier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168232)
8. Go to [Ranni's Rise](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165878) and speak with [Ranni the Witch](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166221) who will turn you away
9. Speak with [Sorcerer Rogier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168232) who tells you to serve Ranni
10.  Return to [Ranni the Witch](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166221) and begin her questline
11. Visit [Sorcerer Rogier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168232) once more and exhaust all dialogue options
12.  Wait for a while and you'll find [Rogier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168232) dead in his chair
13. Loot his body for the [Spellblade's Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177446) and [Rogier's Bell Bearing](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177445)

locations.title: Nepheli's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to [Nepheli Loux](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164904) in [Stormveil Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164053)  
**Steps:**
1. Defeat [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164421) (summoning Nepheli is optional)
2. Speak with [Gideon Ofnir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169061)
3. Speak with her [in Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171950) to receive the [Arsenal Charm](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171951)
5. Speak with her at [the Village of the Albinaurics](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166240)
6. Defeat the nearby [Omenkiller](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166426)
7. Speak with her at her new location [in Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171952)
8. Speak with [Gideon Ofnir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169061)
9. Speak with Nepheli once more
9. Go to the [Chapel of Anticipation](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175484) and retrieve [The Stormhawk King](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167207)
10. Return [The Stormhawk King](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167207) to [Nepheli](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171952)
10. Advance [Kenneth Haight's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164854) until you've spoken to him in [Fort Haight](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164002).
11. Ensure the following enemies are defeated - 
    - [Morgott, the Omen King](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167374)
    - [Baleful Shadow](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168546) 
12. Rest at the [Lake-Facing Cliffs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164145) site of grace
13. Meet with [Nepheli](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171949) and [Kenneth Haight](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171948) in the Throne Room and exhaust all dialogue options

**Warning:** Giving [Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877)'s Potion to Nepheli at any time will end her questline.
    
**Note:** Should Seluvis' Quest not be available, this quest will progress as if you handed the potion to Gideon.

locations.title: Hyetta's Quest
locations.description:
**Requirements:** Complete [Irina's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164638)  
**How to Begin:** Speak to [Hyetta](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166502) at the [Lake-Facing Cliffs ](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164145) Site of Grace.  
**Steps:**
1. Obtain a [Shabriri Grape](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165154) from [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164052)'s Throne Room. 
2. Give it to [Hyetta (First Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166502)
3. Obtain another [Shabriri Grape](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166632) from the [Purified Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164172).
4. Give it to [Hyetta (Second Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166503)
5. Go to the [Revenger's Shack](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166810) and rest at the site of grace nearby.
6. Shortly after you wake, you'll be invaded by [Edgar The Revenger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166811).  
7. Kill and loot him for the [Shabriri Grape](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168222).
8. Give the Grape to [Hyetta (3rd Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166642)
9. Go to the [Church of Inhibition](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165517).
10. Shortly after arriving you'll be invaded by [Festering Fingerprint Vyke](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167188).
Kill and loot him for the [Fingerprint Grape](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168230).
11. Go to [Bellum Church](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164403) and give her the Fingerprint Grape
12. Go to the [Frenzied Flame Proscription](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168677) (kill [Mohg, the Omen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168657) to reveal this Site of Grace).
13. Hit the shrine behind the Site of Grace to reveal a hidden passage.  
14. Traverse the passage and descend all the way to the bottom until you find [Hyetta (5th location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177232).  Exhaust all dialogue with her.
15. Enter through the Flame Door.
16. Speak with [Hyetta (5th location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177232) once more to complete this quest.

**Loot:** 
- [Frenzied Flame Seal](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177029)

locations.title: Alexander Iron Fist's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Alexander Iron Fist](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164117).  
**Steps:**
1. Hit him a few times with your weapon; doing so will dislodge him.
2. Speak with him to receive [Triumphant Delight](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164118) and some [Exalted Flesh](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164119).
3. Speak with him in his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165129) in [Gael Tunnel](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164414).
4. Advance [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648) until you learn about [Starscourge Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165444) from [Sorceress Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164616).
5. Speak with him in his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168095) in [Redmane Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164397).
6. Defeat [Starscourge Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165444).
7. Speak with him in Liurnia of Lakes at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168542) and use an Oil Pot to free him. This step can be skipped by proceeding to his next location.
8. Speak with him in his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167816) in [Mt. Gelmir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167816).
8. Alexander will now appear in [Crumbling Farum Azula](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167132) as a [boss](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169811); defeat him to complete the quest.

locations.title: Yura's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Bloody Finger Hunter Yura](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164632)  
**Steps:**
1. Speak with him; he will inform you of a nearby dragon.
2. Defeat [Flying Dragon Agheel](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164484); doing so will make Yura tell you the location of [Church of Dragon Communion](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163996).
3. Approach [Murkwater Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164022) to trigger the [Bloody Finger Nerijus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164492) invasion. Defeat him with the help of Yura.
4. Speak with him at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165104).
5. Interact with his [summoning sigil](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166758) to invade his world.
6. Defeat [Bloody Finger Assassin](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166731), then speak with him.
7. Speak with him at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168052), at the [Second Church of Marika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165478).
8. Defeat [Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168051).
9. Speak with his possessed body at his [final location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169813).

locations.title: Fia's Quest
locations.description:
**Requirements:** Defeat [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164421)

**How to Begin:** Speak with [Fia, Deathbed Companion](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167503)  
**Steps:**
1. Progress [Rogier's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169102) up until you give the [Black Knifeprint](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166486) to Rogier
2. Speak with [Fia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167503), reload the area, then speak with [Sorcerer Rogier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168232)
3. Head to [Altus Plateau](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166995) and talk to [Fia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177448) near the [Grand Lift of Dectus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164180)
4. Speak with [Fia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167503) to receive the [Weathered Dagger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170980)
5. Give the Dagger to [D (Roundtable Hold)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167782)
6. Reload [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686) and speak with Fia in her new location near [Smithing Master Hewg](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167788)
7. Obtain the [Cursemark of Death](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169305) which can be had from [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648)
8. Go to the [Prince of Death's Throne](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167604) and speak with [Fia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169059).  Embrace her when she asks if you came to kill her.
9. Reload the area, then speak with [Fia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169059) again
10. Enter the dream and defeat [Lichdragon Fortissax](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168158)
11. Return to [Fia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169059) to obtain the [Mending Rune of the Death-Prince](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177162) and [Fia’s Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168993)

locations.title: Varré's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Varré](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164440) and exhaust all dialogue options.    
**Steps:**
1. Speak with all NPC's in the [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686)
2. Speak with [Varré](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164440) again at the [The First Step](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163930)
3. Destroy [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164421)
4. Speak with [Finger Reader Enia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170553) in the [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686) 
5. Speak with [Varré (Second Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166244) at the [Rose Church](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165504)
6.  Use a Festering Bloody Fingers to invade another player's world 3 different times (combat outcome irrelevant)
7. Speak with [Varré (Second Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166244) in front of the [Rose Church](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165504)
8. Soak the cloth in maiden's blood (recommended to find dead maidens in the [Church of Inhibition](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165517)
9. Speak with [Varré (Second Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166244) again for some loot
10. Use the Pureblood Knight's Medal to travel to [Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168582)
11. Kill the Nameless White Mask on location in the Blood Swamp after he invades 3 times to obtain his armor and mask - 
    - [Nameless White Mask](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170262)
    - [Nameless White Mask](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170263)
    - [Nameless White Mask](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170264)
12. Go activate the [White Mask Varré](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=174889) summoning sigil to invade Varré's world and defeat him
13. After returning to your world, speak with Varré to obtain your reward.
  

**Loot:**
- [Bloody Finger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177159)
- [Pureblood Knight's Medal](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177160)
- [White Mask](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170266)
- [War Surgeon Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170265)
- [Varré's Bouquet](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=174890)

locations.title: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Gurranq, Beast Clergyman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165617) after completing [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218)  
**Steps:**

1. [Gurranq, Beast Clergyman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165617) can be traded up to 9 Deathroot for loot (see his [pin](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165617) for loot specifics)
2. Find Deathroot scattered throughout the Lands Between at the following locations:
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164510)
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164860)
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166485)
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166620)
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167214)
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167559)
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167667)
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168012)
   - [Deathroot](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170203)
3. After the giving Gurranq the 4th Deathroot, he will attack upon your next return. Damage him sufficiently and he will stop and become available as a merchant again.

locations.title: Millicent's Quest
locations.description:
**Requirements:** Complete [Gowry's Request](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166842)

**How to Begin:** Speak with [Millicent (1st Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167228) in the [Church of Plague](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165583)  
**Steps:**
1. Obtain the [Valkyrie's Prosthesis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166747) found inside [The Shaded Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165485)
2. Give it to [Millicent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167562) found just north of the [Erdtree-Gazing Hill](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167001) Site of Grace
3. Go to [Windmill Heights](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166225) and speak with [Millicent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168077) there
4. Go to [Ancient Snow Valley Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167195) and speak with [Millicent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169055) there
5. Go to the [Prayer Room](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167415) and speak with [Millicent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170279) there
6. Go to the [Drainage Channel](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167414) and defeat the [Ulcerated Tree Spirit](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176825)
7. After defeating the Spirit, choose the red or gold summoning sigil to challenge or assist Millicent respectively - see [Assisting Millicent / Challenging Millicent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177432)
8. Talk to Millicent after in the same area and get the [Unalloyed Gold Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167903)
9. Defeat [Malenia, Blade of Miquella](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167678)
10. Reload the boss area and interact with the Malenia's flower body to get the [Miquella's Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176810)

locations.title: Blackguard's Quest
locations.description:
**Requirements:** Begin [Rya's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166813) then begin this quest before reaching the [Volcano Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164405)

**How to Begin:** Speak with [Blackguard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166187)  
**Steps:**
1. Buy [Rya's Necklace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177671) from him
2. Buy Boiled Prawns from him
3. Go to [Capital Rampart](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165524) and speak with [Blackguard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168160) nearby about Dung Eater
4. Progress [Milos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072) until after you free him from the gaol
5. Speak with [Blackguard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168160) who will warn you again about Dung Eater
6. Reload the area and speak with the dying [Blackguard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168160).  [Dung Eater will invade you](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169012) after this conversation.

locations.title: Jar-Bairn's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to [Jar-Bairn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170335)  
**Steps:**
1. Speak to Jar-bairn multiples time by reloading the area.
2. Complete [Alexander Iron Fist's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170547) in Crumbling Farum Azula to obtain [Alexander's Innards](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170549).
3. Give Alexander's Innards to Jar-Bairn and speak to him.
4. Reload the area and you'll find the [Companion Jar talisman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177963) at Jar-Bairn's previous location.

locations.title: Tanith's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Tanith](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167573) upon gaining access to the [Volcano Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164405)  
**Steps:**
1. Talk to Tanith and say yes to her when she asks you to join the Family. She will give you a key to acces the other dorms.
2. The room with Rya has your first assasination target: Old knight Istvan. After defeating him return to Tanith to get your reward: Magma Shot.

locations.title: Brother Corhyn's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Brother Corhyn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167781).  
**Steps:**
1. Rest at any Site of Grace in Altus Plateau.
2. Speak with him; he will move to his [2nd location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167661).
3. Speak with [Goldmask](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168529).
4. Speak with Brother Corhyn; he will move next to Goldmask, at his [3rd location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168530).
5. Obtain two Great Runes; he and Goldmask will move at their [4th location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168528). Speak with Brother Cohryn here.
6. Solve the [Statue of Radagon](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=180807) puzzle.
7. Return to speak with Brother Cohryn; he and Goldmask will move to their [5th location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169054).
8. Speak with Brother Corhyn.
    - You may choose to offer him the [Tonic of Forgetfulness](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178118). He will refuse it, but simply offering it will change the end of his quest.
9. Complete [Crumbling Farum Azula](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167132).
    - **Note:** Completing this step before the others will end the questline. Brother Cohryn's gear (see [Brother Corhyn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167781) will be dropped at the last location you saw him.
10. Speak with both Brother Corhyn and Goldmask:
    - Goldmask will be here. Speak with him once to receive the [Mending Rune of Perfect Order](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177441). Reload the area and return to receive [Goldmask Armor Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177442).
    - If you offered the tonic to Brother Corhyn, he will still be at his 5th location. Speak with him, then reload the area to receive his gear (see [Brother Corhyn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167781)).
    - If you didn't offer him the tonic, he will move at his 6th location. Speak with him, then reload the area to receive his gear (see [Brother Corhyn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167781)).

locations.title: Bernahl's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to [Recusant Bernahl](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169810) the [Volcano Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164405) and exhaust all dialogue options.    
**Steps:**
1. Progress [Tanith's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178114) after the second assassination
2. Speak to [Recusant Bernahl](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169810) to receive the "Letter to Bernahl" (NB: You need to do this quest before completing Volcano Manor)
3. Go to [Fortified Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167194) to kill invaders [Vargram](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168423) and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm near the First Floor Site of Grace. Recusant Bernahl assiste you for this fight and you received the [Raging Wolf Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168413) after your victory
4. You can then return to [Volcano Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164405) and speak to [Bernahl](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169810) to get the [Gelmir's Fury](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175955) sorcery

**Note:** You need to do this quest before completing [Volcano Manor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164405), so before killing [Rykard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167571) and also before killing [Maliketh](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167619)

locations.title: Latenna Albinauric Quest
locations.description:
1. Retrieve the [Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167191)
2. Clear the Lakeside Crystal Cave
3. She will be on the back side of the cave on a ledge off the cliff
4. Locate Latenna at [Apostate Derelict](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167151)

NOTE: She will die if you get both pieces of the Medallion before talking to her.

[Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167291)

locations.title: Sorcerer Rogier
locations.description: NPC Golden summon signal just before the fog wall of the Margit fight

locations.title: Old Knight Istvan
locations.description: **Related Boss:** [Demi-Human Chief (2)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164457)

locations.title: Yura (Raya Lucaria)
locations.description:
**Related Boss:** [Bloody Finger Assassin](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166731)  
**Quest:** Part of [Yura's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170973); completing the fight yields [Ash of War: Raptor of the Mists](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167184) and [Smithing Stone [5]](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169756)

locations.title: Nepheli Loux, Warrior

locations.description:
**Special:** Summoning sigils will constantly appear during the fight, bypassing the usual summon limit. These NPCs will be available to summon, under certain conditions:
- **Alexander Iron Fist:** Available after step 4 of [his quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170547).

locations.title: Millicent
locations.description: Gold summon sign for the NPC Milicent, requires having talked to her at [her second location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167695) in Gowry's Shack

locations.title: Assisting Sellen
locations.description:
**Location:** At the entrance of [Raya Lucaria Grand Library](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164426), after progressing through [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621).  
**Fight:** Witch-Hunter Jerren, assisted by Sorceress Sellen  
**Rewards:**
- Moves [Sorceress Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164616) to Raya Lucaria, unlocking [Shard Spiral](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170415).
- [Eccentric Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168990), dropped by Witch-Hunter Jerren
- [Witch’s Glintstone Crown](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168991), dropped in front of Sellen after reloading the area.
- [Glintstone Kris](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170416), given by Sellen after speaking with her.

locations.title: Challenging Sellen
locations.description:
**Location:** At the entrance of [Raya Lucaria Grand Library](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164426), after progressing through [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621).  
**Fight:** Sorceress Sellen, assisted by Witch-Hunter Jerren  
**Rewards:**
- [Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170417)
- [Sellen's Bell Bearing](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170418)
- [Witch’s Glintstone Crown](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168991), dropped in front of Sellen after reloading the area.

**Location:** Find the red and gold summoning sigils on a slope at the right of the rot pond. Both appear after defeating the Ulcerated Tree Spirit and advancing [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656) to the point she is in the [Prayer Room](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167415) Site of Grace.

**Assissting Millicent:** Help her fight the four Millicent's Sisters.  
**Reward:** Rotten Winged Sword Insignia.

**Challenging Millicent:** Invade Millicent and defeat her.  
**Reward:** Millicent's Prosthesis.

locations.title: Fire Knight Hilde
locations.description:
**Location:** On a ledge jutting out from the wall at the very top of the loft area. To get to it, follow these steps:
1. Send the elevator closest to the wall down, stepping back onto the platform so you don't descend with it.
2. Wait for the elevator furthest from the wall to ascend, then do the same thing — sending it down and stepping back to stay on the platform.
3. Quickly hurry over to the first elevator and jump down onto the top of the elevator as it's ascending.
4. Carefully jump from the top of the elevator onto the ledge.

The weapon sits on a stone altar.  
**Type:** Straight Sword  
**Weapon Skill:** Square Off

**Note:** This weapon can be upgraded to either the [Sword of Darkness](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382161) or the [Sword of Light](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382518). **Note:** This location is an altar that upgrades the [Stone-Sheathed Sword](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382155) to the Sword of Darkness. If you find this location first, then the Stone-Sheathed Sword and Sword of Darkness locations will swap. If you obtain the [Sword of Light](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382518), you may return here to turn it back into the Sword of Darkness.

locations.title: Queelign
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Once you open the room with the [Prayer Room Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381928), Queelign will be found on the floor praying to Marika.

You can choose to give him either:

1. The [Iris of Grace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381354), and receive the [Fire Knight Queelign](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382894) Spirit Ashes.

2. Or give him one of the 3 [Iris of Occultation](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381817)s, and receive [Queelign's Greatsword](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382893).

**Important:** As the [Iris of Grace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381354) is only found once and therefore limited compared to the 3 Iris of Occulation and being able to use them on [Jolán](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382004) too, you may want to consider which Iris of Grace reward you want to obtain.

locations.title: Leda's Questline (1st battle)
locations.description:
**Location:** In the center of the bridge. After progressing through [Needle Knight Leda's questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453), two summon signs will appear.  
**Helping Leda:**
- Ends [Hornsent's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387464)
- Progresses [Needle Knight Leda's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453)
- [Falx](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387421)
- [Hornsent's Armor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387458)

**Helping Hornsent:**
- Ends [Needle Knight Leda's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453), except the last step.
- [Ash of War: Swift Slash](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387459)
- [Leda's Rune](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387460)

**Helping neither (skipping the fight):**
- Progresses [Leda's Questline (1st battle)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381987). **ONLY IF** Hornsent is summoned against [Messmer the Impaler](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381741)

locations.title: Leda's Questline (2nd battle)
locations.description:
**Location:** In the back room of [Storehouse, First Floor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381345). After progressing through [Needle Knight Leda's questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453), two summon signs will appear:   
**Helping Leda:**
- Progresses [Needle Knight Leda's questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453)
- Ends [Sir Ansbach's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387468)
- [Ansbach's Longbow](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387462)
- [Ansbach's Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=386515)

**Helping Ansbach:**
- Ends [Needle Knight Leda's questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453), except the last step.
- [Ansbach's Longbow](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387462)
- [Leda's Rune](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387460)

**Helping neither (skipping the fight):** As Helping Ansbach, without the items.
